original_text: Also Cyrus the king brought forth the vessels of the house of the Lord, which Nebuchadnezzar had brought forth out of Jerusalem, and had put them in the house of his gods;
korean_text: 고레스 왕이 또 여호와의 성전 그릇을 꺼내니 옛적에 느부갓네살이 예루살렘에서 옮겨다가 자기 신들의 신당에 두었던 것이라

sentences.original_text: the vessels of the house of the Lord,
and had put them in the house of his gods;
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 신들의 집에 두었던 것들을
